about_the_game:
Game introduction


《Fragment time》is a 2D dynamic jigsaw puzzle. Each jigsaw puzzle takes beauty as the theme background. Each picture has different styles and themes, which may be different It's punk style or magic style. One of the many pictures is always suitable for you.

Game features


The pictures of each puzzle are displayed dynamically.

Each picture has different difficulty choices and different ranking displays under different difficulties. You can challenge with good friends

Ranking under the same difficulty, brothers come to fight for the fastest one!

content_descriptors.notes: 《Fragment time》Adult content contains pornographic content, which is mainly reflected in naked clothes and sexual hints.

name: 碎片时间（Fragment time）

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® 7 SP1 / 8.1 / 10 64-bit
  • Processor: AMD FX-4350 / Intel® Core™ i3-3210
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon™ R7 260X (2GB VRAM) / NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 750(2GB VRAM)
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows® 7 SP1 / 8.1 / 10 64-bit
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen™ 3 1200 / Intel® Core™ i5-6400
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon™ RX 470(4GB VRAM) / NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1060 6 GB VRAM
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: 《Fragment time》It is a 2D dynamic puzzle game with different difficulties for players to choose. It can unconsciously improve hand speed and memory.
